data.actual_result: Discord freezes to a stand still and does not attach the image
data.expected_result: Discord takes the picture and puts it into an attachment
data.short_description: Using Discord in app camera with flash set to ON, not auto, causes Discord to freeze after picture is taken. IS EXCLUSIVE TO S6 on 7.0 in general
data.steps_to_repro: - tap the add file button heavy_plus_sign - scroll to the camera option - set flash to be ON (defaults to auto) take picture *note that you should not go into full screen mode since the bug doesn't seem to be present there
